antiPatterns.name: CRUDy Interface
antiPatterns.description: An RPC-like behaviour is used to design create, read, update and delete (CRUD) operations as service interfaces which can results in chatty interfaces.
antiPatterns.consequences: Chatty interfaces because multiple methods need to be invoked to achieve one goal.
antiPatterns.solution: CRUD interfaces should not be exposed via interfaces.
